title: Summer Camp Captive
description: Lainey has heard the ghost stories of the beast in the woods, but one night around a campfire she discovers some legends are true.The Butcher has watched her from a distance, but he’s a man with needs and won’t deny himself any longer. We’ve teamed up with Jessa Kane again to bring you filthy, over-the-top hotness. It’s ridiculously fun, so don’t be shy! Grab your marshmallows and join us for this dirty treat!
author: Alexa Riley
